scene_description_enriched: A haloed elder with a long white beard, dressed in a black monastic robe with gold trim, stands in a landscape. He holds an open red book in his left hand and a bell in his right. At his feet, a small brown dog is depicted amidst flames. Behind him is a reddish-brown brick wall, and beyond that, a building with a blue roof and windows, and several stylized green trees under a blue sky. The scene is framed by decorative borders.
